designScenario.name: V H F Radio
designScenario.description: The VHF Radio is a mission-critical avionics system enabling air-to-ground and air-to-air voice and data communication within the VHF aeronautical band (118-137 MHz). Designed for line-of-sight operations, it incorporates software-defined radio (SDR) technology for waveform flexibility, triple modular redundancy for fault tolerance, and digital signal enhancement to maintain clarity in high-noise environments. The system complies with next-generation CNS/ATM requirements and integrates with onboard datalink systems for enhanced situational awareness.

details.description: Support simultaneous analog AM voice and ACARS digital data transmission with automatic mode switching based on ATC coordination.
Maintain channel spacing accuracy of ±0.0025% across operating temperature range (-55°C to +70°C) to prevent adjacent channel interference.
Implement triple voting redundancy for transceiver chains with hot standby switching within 5ms of fault detection via BIT (Built-In Test).
Achieve DAL-B certification per DO-178C for configurable waveform software and DO-331 model-based development compliance.

systemComponents.name: SDR Transceiver Unit
systemComponents.description: Multi-channel SDR platform supporting simultaneous RX/TX operations with field-programmable RF front-end and baseband processing

subComponents.name: Wideband RF Frontend
subComponents.description: Covers 118-137 MHz with 100Hz frequency resolution using direct digital synthesis (DDS)

subComponents.name: Adaptive Equalizer
subComponents.description: Mitigates multipath fading through real-time channel impulse response analysis

systemComponents.name: Crypto Management Module
systemComponents.description: Provides AES-256 encryption for sensitive ATC datalink communications with key rotation mechanism

systemComponents.name: Redundant Power Controller
systemComponents.description: Dual-redundant 28VDC input with automatic cross-tie switching and surge suppression to MIL-STD-704F

subComponents.name: Solid-State Power Relay
subComponents.description: Galvanically isolated FET-based switch with <5μs failover time

systemComponents.name: Antenna Diversity System
systemComponents.description: Implements MIMO-like spatial diversity using top-mounted and belly antennas with automatic pattern optimization

subComponents.name: VSWR Monitor
subComponents.description: Continuously measures antenna impedance match with ±0.5:1 accuracy

relationships.description: Encrypted baseband I/Q samples transferred via secure DMA channel between SDR and crypto module
Power controller contains dedicated voltage regulators specifically designed for SDR FPGA core voltages
Antenna system provides spatially diverse RF inputs to SDR's multi-channel receiver stages
Crypto module requires clean 5V reference from power controller's EMI-filtered auxiliary output
